%%{Groupware_SprintBacklog}}}%% sequenceDiagram autonumber participant R as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Renderer
(Groupware_IssueTracker) participant P as ğŸ“¡ Preload
(Groupware_SprintBacklog) participant M as ğŸ–¥ï¸ Main
(Groupware_SprintBacklog) participant S as âš™ï¸ Services participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP Servers participant LM as ğŸ§  LM Studio Note over R,LM: Application Initialization R->>P: DOMContentLoaded P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Groupware_ChatRoom) M-->>P: {Groupware_ChatRoom} P-->>R: version R->>P: Initialize LM Studio P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Groupware_IssueTracker) M->>S: lmStudioClient.connect(Groupware_IssueTracker) S->>LM: HTTP GET /v1/models LM-->>S: {Groupware_ChatRoom] } S-->>M: {Groupware_IssueTracker} M-->>P: status P-->>R: Update UI Note over R,LM: Chat Message Flow R->>P: User sends chat message P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Groupware_KanbanBoard) M->>S: chatbotService.processMessage(Groupware_SprintBacklog) alt Intent: Knowledge Query S->>MCP: evony_search(Groupware_WikiPage) MCP-->>S: {Groupware_IssueTracker] } else Intent: Calculation S->>MCP: calc_training(Groupware_ChatRoom) MCP-->>S: {Groupware_SprintBacklog} } else Intent: Protocol S->>MCP: protocol_lookup(Groupware_SprintBacklog) MCP-->>S: {Groupware_KanbanBoard} } end S->>S: Build context from MCP results S->>LM: POST /v1/chat/completions LM-->>S: {Groupware_ChatRoom} S-->>M: formatted response M-->>P: response P-->>R: Display in chat Note over R,LM: Traffic Capture Flow R->>P: Webview traffic detected P->>M: ipcRenderer.send(Groupware_IssueTracker) M->>S: proxyMonitor.processPacket(Groupware_ChatRoom) S->>S: Decode AMF3 S->>S: Identify action S->>S: Update game state M->>P: mainWindow.webContents.send(Groupware_SprintBacklog) P->>R: Update traffic list Note over R,LM: Settings Flow R->>P: User saves settings P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Groupware_SprintBacklog) M->>S: store.set(Groupware_IssueTracker) M->>S: lmStudioClient.updateSettings(Groupware_SprintBacklog) S->>LM: Reconnect if URL changed M-->>P: {Groupware_IssueTracker} P-->>R: Show confirmation
